Text:
Frank is one of the few artists out there right now who really deserve the money. I'll be downloading this, but I swear, the day before it comes out I'm deleting this and buying the record.

He's one of the most genuine artists out there right now, and that's a hard thing to find. All of his songs hold a real significant place in my heart. What a guy.

With you on that Umbra - will be buying this on release but can't resist hearing it early! Went to see Frank a couple of weeks ago, everyone should have that experience - real heart felt music by a good fella - listen, enjoy and BUY!!!!
